text:
When adding a table-footer the hotspot for a basic-length appears to be offset 
toward the bottom by the height of the footer. Is the position incorrectly 
taking into account the table rows in the footer?
creator: David.Holscher@nav-international.com
pascal.sancho@takoma.fr
text: Fixed in FOP 0.94 and probably earlier versions

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
